colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES RTEN @008A *, ,'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THO YON BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DPAL SNAR THANG PA DANG, DGE BSHES 'CHAD KHA BA GNYIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS LA GZHI BYAS TE, ^LHA'I BTZUN PA SKU SKYE BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO,, BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
